keyword: how many calories in 3 oz chicken breast
title: How Many Calories in 3 oz Chicken Breast?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in 3 oz chicken breast, plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, fat, carbs, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in 3 oz Chicken Breast?
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (grilled or roasted), no added oil, sauce, or seasonings; 3 oz â‰ˆ 85 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, cooking method, brand, and exact weight; values are estimates. Check labels or use a food scale for precision.

quick_answer.text: 3 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast provides ~140 kcal and ~26 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g during cooking
Marinated with 1 tbsp sauce per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 3 oz chicken breast?
faqs.a: Approximately 140 kcal for cooked, skinless chicken breast.

faqs.q: How much protein is in 3 oz chicken breast?
Are these calories for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked weight; raw chicken breast would weigh more for the same portion after cooking.

faqs.q: What changes the calories in chicken breast the most?
faqs.a: Added oils, skin, breading, or sauces can significantly increase calories.

faqs.q: What are the nutrition facts per oz of chicken breast?
faqs.a: Per oz: ~47 kcal, 8.7 g protein, 1 g fat, 0 g carbs.
